#summary Menu drawing subroutine.
#labels Command, Doc
<wiki:comment>
	type: command
	name: menu
	language: sh
</wiki:comment>

`menu "title" "list"`


== Description ==

Menu takes a newline delimited list as the second argument, and a title as the first, and echos the entry in the list the user chooses to stdout.

== Required Files ==

 * awk - base
    one-true-awk
